wikipedia_page.main: Ian Plenderleith  (born 27 September 1943) was a member of the Bank of England's Monetary Policy Committee from June 1997 to May 2002.He is a former Chairman of Morgan Stanley since 2011 and the Board of Governors at Reed's School, Cobham.

response: * Ian Plenderleith, MBA 1971, Former Deputy Governor, South African Reserve Bank
* Ian Plenderleith. Lately Executive Director. For services to the Bank of England. (Petworth, West Sussex)
